overview:
Pierre-Eric Leibovici is a Partner at Orkos Capital, a Venture Private Equity fund based in Paris. He is board member of Audisoft, www.Liligo.com and www.muzicall.com and former board member of www.aplio.com (sold to www.net2phone.com), www.zandan.com (sold to www.keynote.com), Urbi TV (sold to Hersant Media, www.allocine.com solde to Canal+, www.musiwave.net (sold to www.openwave.com, www.boostworks,…).

After a first experience with Merrill Lynchâ€™s emerging market risk management entity in New York, Pierre-Eric Leibovici joined the Banexi, the BNP Paribas groupâ€™s investment bank, in the communications industries department and started working on the first ETMF fund generation at that time.

In addition, he is a professor of financial engineering at ESCP EAP and has co-authored a book on legal, fiscal and financial engineering (IngÃ©nierie FinanciÃ¨re, Fiscale et Juridique, 2009-2010, Dalloz).
